title: George Town, Penang
summary: George Town is the capital city of the Malaysian state of Penang. George Town is Malaysia's third most populous city with 708,127 inhabitants as of 2010, while Greater Penang, with a population of 2,412,616, is the second largest conurbation in the country after Greater Kuala Lumpur.[6][7][8] The historical core of George Town has been inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2008.[9]
